message: [embedly-jquery/master] Adds autoplay and upcoming width attr to the jquery lib as well as updates the URLre - Sean Creeley (https://github.com/embedly/embedly-jquery/commit/9ed49ee8db9055fe7e7844a6c71abe012ba9fe43)

Hi ya! I'm using the Embedly javascript tag and trying to figure out if it can automatically embed images from direct links. Say for example: http://lolbot.net/pix/2311.jpg

It seems like it's possible since using a direct link in the Explore tool displays the image: 
http://explore.embed.ly/oembed/?mode=rich&url=http%3A%2F%2Flolbot.net%2Fpix%2F2311.jpg

Any pointers?
I sent you an email on this. Let me know if you have anymore questions.
@screeley Awesome, thanks for the response. Cheers.
